answers.answer: That is a sure sign of preeclampsia .. go to your hospital and get checked out.. sorry if im worrying you but preeclampsia is a serious condition and if not treated can turn into eclampsia which is very dangerous for you and baby. It could be nothing but Please take my advice abd get checked out just incase. Xx
Thanks hun im still trying to get hold of my midwife as its still on going... hope i can get sorted x
Sounds like something is going on with Ur pregnancy I would go to labor and delivery. Could be stressing the baby

question: Ok so im 39 weeks on Saturday and i have serious bad heartburn but also swelling in my legs and hands and keep getting headaches which cause me blured vision at times. Im getting worried as i also have had diarreah for like 2 weeks and sickness too... i cant get to see my midwife as she is on holiday and my doctor has no appointments for this week. Please help. X
